mapper.select: select a.id, a.board 'boardId', a.writer, a.title, a.content, a.date, a.notice, a.category, u.name 'userName', c.name 'cateName' from article a join user u on a.writer = u.id join category c on a.category = c.id where a.id = #{articleId} and a.board = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: insert article (board, writer, title, content, category) values (#{boardId}, #{userId}, #{title},#{contents}, #{category})
